name: D'ice
description:
Game Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

In this game you play as a penguin, starting in his new job at D'ice Industries.
Here you will work loading some fragile D'ices onto a truck, while navigating some frozen mayhem.

but, please, mind it with care, since the D'ices can't sustain some damage. The number at the dice face will indicate the height that this D'ice can fall without break!

Plan your movement with care, Build your own platforms, Navigate through different maps and Solve numerical and plaftorming puzzles and remember to Roll of those d'ices!

::INSTRUCTIONS::
MOVE LEFT:  A or Left Arrow Key
MOVE RIGHT:  D or Right Arrow Key
JUMP: W or Up Arrow Key
CHANGE ACTION: Tab
EXECUTE ACTION: Space Bar (Press any WASD or Arrow Key to select Action Target)
TELEPORT/RESTART: R

::HOW TO INTERACT WITH BLOCKS::
If your character is not moving, you can press Space to enter in 'Action Mode'. In this mode, you can press WASD or Arrow Keys indicating the blocks you're aiming for.
You can swap your actions between TAKE or BREAK with Tab Key.
